name: react-transfer
description: Rendering components in a different location.
author: Takaaki Watanabe

scripts.example:build: npm run example:src && npm run example:src:min && npm run example:es5:lib && npm run example:es5:lib:min
scripts.example:es5:lib: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js example/es5/lib/react-transfer.js
scripts.example:es5:lib:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js example/es5/lib/react-transfer.min.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run example:build
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/react-transfer.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/react-transfer.min.js
